activities: PlanBase provides web-based, organization-wide planning and process improvement software.  Paid users of our software enter their name, email address and optionally their phone number into our software.  This data is stored in databases on our servers (at Rackspace which is safe-harbor certified) and on encrypted CD backups which are kept in a physically secure and environmentally controlled area until they are destroyed at the end of their record-retention period.  At various times we may also collect a persons Title, Company Name, Company Address, Number of Employees in Company, and company Time Zone.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
